data: July | Chappiquiddick Island | Massachusetts | Boston Post

One warm evening in July after the chores were done, I was sitting on the kitchen steps of my farmhouse, on Chappiquiddick Island off the coast of Massachusetts, idly glancing through the _Boston Post_ of that morning, when for some reason the following item happened to attract my attention:
